name: mpz_prp
short_description:
This code is an implementation of several prp (pseudoprime) tests in C and GMP. The provided C file includes a main routine that will run all tests on a list of 25 numbers, starting with the one provided as input.
Updated 2013/07/03 to fix some minor issues with the mpz_extrastronglucas_prp function.
